website_summaries.verdict: Its unique styling and warm material make it worth considering, especially for owners with extra-large dogs that are difficult to find sweaters that fit.
pros: Sports a cute faux leather paw print and neutral colors
The wide turtleneck design is ideal for dogs with stout builds
Comes in a variety of sizes that also accommodate extra-large dogs (up to 37-inch chest girth)
cons: It runs large and lengthy on small dogs
Not dryer-safe, and washing on the gentle cycle is recommended

customer_reviews.title: Good sweater
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality of the sweater was very good, but unfortunately I had ordered the wrong size and had to return it. Add to that, I don't think my dog liked it, but I like Zack and Zoey 's line, so will be looking for another sweater or jacket from them.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Soft & warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a real soft & warm sweater that fits my doggy perfect
customer_reviews.author: Calua may

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, but unraveled
customer_reviews.text: My pup loved the sweater , she would get excited every time I took it out for her to wear around the house . However , she has only worn it 4 times , indoors, and it seems that one of the seams ripped and unraveled on the sweater . I ordered a bigger size for my dog , she is a medium but I ordered a large to be safe , and it fit her baggy and she still loved it. I would buy another one because she loved it so much but not if they are easily coming apart .
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Cano

customer_reviews.title: Stretches beyond original size
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute sweater, but the neck stretches out so much that it actually falls off of my dog as he moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Fit for the cold
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my boy, good quality and so so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom former teacher

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second one for other dog I loved so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N. Comer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sweater we have gotten for our Chinese Crested Hairless!!!! He loves it and that is what matters!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neck stretches out way too much.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but the neck stretched out after 2 hours of wearing it. It looked like an “off the shoulder” sweater so I kept having to rearrange the neck. I was bummed, he will not be wearing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Material is great though and it will keep him warm in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the measurement chart and got a medium for my dog but it’s a little roomy. Material is great though and it will keep him warm in the upcoming winter months!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Le

customer_reviews.title: The sweater was adorable but WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: The sweater was adorable but WAY too big. I’m not sure if it runs big or this was mislabeled
customer_reviews.author: Sbjohn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Stretchy, easy to put on, but I think it's itchy on my dog :/ I washed it with some fabric softener, maybe that will help
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog donut loves it she is not so cold anymore
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this sweater, I had to get it. My Boston has a sweater for indoors when the A/C is on; this one is for outdoors when we run around at the park. I had to get this b/c this Boston in the photo looks exactly like my young man, right down to being liver colored. I knew my boy would look just like this, so it was an easy decision. Highly recommend for dogs with little hair to keep them warm.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Size runs large.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than described. Measured my 12 lb mini schnauzer and it's too long. Covers his tail. He sits and won't move when it's on. Kind of funny. It's so warm! Wish it fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S. Brown

product_meta.title: Zack & Zoey Aberdeen Sweater for Dogs, 16" Medium
product_meta.description:
With its faux leather pawprint applique and wide-ribbed turtle neck and trim, this warm and comfortable Zack & Zoey Aberdeen Sweater has a truly classic look. 

Material: 100% acrylic
Size: Medium measures 16"
Care: Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle. Line dry.
feature_bullets: Faux leather pawprint appliqu for fashion detail
Wide-ribbed turtle neck and trim for warmth and comfort
